Hi everyone! I’m new to HubSpot, and I need to modify the header of a drag and drop template to add some styles, I came with the problem that I can’t edit the HTML in this template type or maybe I just don’t know how to. If anyone has some pointers or other approach I’ll appreciate the help. Thanks in advance :smiley:

CC: <@U03EQ75HQUS>
Unfortunately, the `<head>` can’t be edited in the drag and drop editor. If you need more control you’ll need to do a custom coded email/template.
